name: VanHelsingsMaze
description:
Hey Gamer, thank you for playing and testing my first ever Game!

Im an Computer Science Student and literally startet making my first contacts with Games Programming. The Game has some texture Bugs and the game mechanics are a bit of the course but it should be playable.


The difficulty in the Game is quiet hard because the enemie Vampires are damaging you alot
but it would be too easy if they dont.

There is an extra (Easter Eqq) hidden in the Game, which i hope you will find very entertaining!
I really recommend you to take the efford and find the easter Eqq because it tells something about
me as a person and what i like really much. 

If you have any Comments, Recommendations or any Feedback just write me an EMAIL to:
-----     Alpaykucuk@outlook.de      -----

| HOW TO INSTALL |

1.) extract Game Files from VanHelsingMaze.rar
2.) start playing the Game by clicking "VanHelsingsMaze" application!
*3.) if you want the game on your Desktop, DO NOT move the original Application File!
make a shortcut instead move the shortcut to your Desktop!

| HERE ARE SOME ACTUAL GAME FOOTAGE |

EASTER EGG HINT!
